subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The top fuel driver Rod Fuller ended Larry Dixon's Father's Day winning streak at five yesterday, beating him in the final of the National Hot Rod Association SuperNationals at Old Bridge Township Raceway Park in Englishtown, N.J. Fuller had a quarter-mile run of 4.692 seconds at 314.24 miles an hour.
